benchmark_details.name: MojoBench
benchmark_details.overview: MojoBench is the first framework for Mojo code generation, introducing HumanEval-Mojo, a benchmark dataset designed for evaluating code LLMs on Mojo, and Mojo-Coder, an LLM pretrained and finetuned for Mojo code generation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate and enhance LLM capabilities specifically in the Mojo programming language.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The limited availability of Mojo content on the web significantly constrained dataset sizes.

data.source: Curated from publicly available sources including GitHub repositories, tutorials, and official documentation.

methodology.calculation: Performance is measured using the pass@1 metric, which indicates the percentage of correct code generation.
methodology.interpretation: Higher pass@1 scores indicate better model performance in generating correct Mojo code.
methodology.validation: Models were evaluated against the HumanEval-Mojo benchmark.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data collected strictly from publicly available sources ensuring compliance with ethical guidelines.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Data sources used respect Apache 2.0 licensing.
